<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mental Static](/Feats.aspx?ID=3674) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Nonlethal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=188" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 27</row>

**Trigger**
You roll a critical success on a Will save against a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect from a creature.

</column>

---

Your thoughts sting back when a lesser mind tries to invade your own. You deal mental damage equal to your level to the triggering creature. If you so desire, you can also send the creature a single mental image to coincide with the damage, such as a watchful eye or the dread of floating in an infinite sea.
name: Mental Static
